skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Expertise in creating responsive and interactive user interfaces using React.js, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Proficient in modern front-end frameworks and UI libraries.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Strong foundation in server-side development using Node.js and Express.js. Experience with RESTful APIs, database management, and server architecture design.

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.description: Specialized in building high-performance mobile applications using Flutter. Expert in creating native-like experiences, complex UI implementations, and seamless platform integration for both iOS and Android platforms.

portfolio.title: MedTime
portfolio.description: Developed a medication management app using Flutter, Firebase, and Riverpod for State Management. Features include reminders, medication management, and timely notifications.

portfolio.title: HomeZmart
portfolio.description: ITI training project - E-commerce web app built with JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. Features product catalog, shopping cart, and responsive design.

portfolio.title: News Aggregator
portfolio.description: ITI training project - Angular news app consuming multiple APIs. Features category filtering, search, and article bookmarking.

portfolio.title: Al-Mentor Admin Dashboard
portfolio.description: Ongoing ITI training project - Angular dashboard with data visualization and user management features.

portfolio.title: Movie Discovery
portfolio.description: ITI training project - React movie app using TMDB API with search, filtering, and watchlist features.

portfolio.title: Shoppy
portfolio.description: E-commerce mobile application connecting customers to suppliers with various products.

portfolio.title: PrepAI
portfolio.description: Meal recommendation app with Gemini AI for dynamic meal suggestions and preparation steps.

portfolio.title: SkyGuard
portfolio.description: App advising users on outdoor safety based on real-time conditions using custom AI model.

portfolio.title: PrtSpd
portfolio.description: Bus booking app with trip comparison, reservations, payments, and real-time updates.

portfolio.title: FlickFind
portfolio.description: Mobile app connecting movie enthusiasts to a vast library of films and TV shows.

portfolio.title: Twitter Clone
portfolio.description: Full-stack Twitter clone built with MERN stack and Socket.io, featuring real-time updates, tweet functionality, and user interactions.
